p: Ethyl 1-(4-methylbenzyl)-2-(4-nitrophenyl)cyclopropane-1-carboxylate (6). The product was obtained as a yellow oil in 9% yield after purification by flash column chromatography using ethyl acetate/petroleum ether (1:99) as eluent. 1H NMR (300 MHz, CDCl 3) δ 8.18 (d, J = 8.8 Hz, 2H), 7.39 (d, J = 8.4 Hz, 2H), 7.00 (q, J = 8.1 Hz, 4H), 4.15 (tt, J = 7.1, 3.5 Hz, 2H), 3.12 (d, J = 15.6 Hz, 1H), 2.99 − 2.82 (m, 1H), 2.29 (s, 3H), 2.08 − 1.88 (m, 2H), 1.47 (dd, J = 7.2, 5.3 Hz, 1H), 1.21 (t, J = 7.1 Hz, 3H).
